Item.Value: [Name:Introduction][Text:Um, hi! $NPC_21$, I mean,my name is $NPC_21$. It's nice to meet you. I heard that you've opened an $Building_24$? I'd love to help out. I've been looking for a place to practice my skills, I'm still learning, you see...][UnlockObjectID:9]
[Text:$Name$, how are you? I... hope everything's alright with you.][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Oh? No, you shouldn't have. I mean, I'm grateful but... If you're sure.][Name:Gift]
[Text:Oh! I've been wanting this! Thank you so much.][Name:Collection]
[Text:Are you sure? I guess I can join you for an adventure today.][Name:JoinPartyYes]
[Text:Sorry... I've got things to do today. Maybe later?][Name:JoinPartyNo]

[Text:I'm glad to see you today, $Name$. You should try to dry off though. Those wet clothes can't be good for you. ... I mean, you should get home and dry off as soon as you can! That's all.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|2]
[Text:It's nice, isn't it? The snow I mean? I uh, hope you've dressed warm.][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snowing|1]
[Text:$Name$... uh, how's the weather? I mean. How are you finding it? Not too cold I hope?][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snowing|2]
[Text:Did you see $NPC_8$ last night? She seemed to be in a bad mood, I thought I saw her hex a squirrel... I better not get on her bad side.][Villager:4][Name:Fran_1]
[Text:I heard $NPC_2$ singing at the $Building_7$ last night. He's really good, isn't he? I wonder if he'd teach me...][Villager:8][Name:Damien_1]

[Text:I had to stop by the $Building_8$ earlier for some reagents... I was looking around and accidentally knocked over a whole jar or herbs! I ran before she caught up to me... I hope she's not too mad. I should go apologize.][Villager:17][Name:Griselda_1]

[Text:$NPC_6$ is pretty funny isn't he? He asked me if I could do anything about a grey hair he found. I didn't know what to say so I just suggested he pluck it? He didn't seem to like my suggestion.][Villager:3][Name:Emmanuel_1]
[Text:$NPC_1$ seems nice, but he's always got this weird look on his face when I see him. I wonder what's wrong with him?][Villager:7][Name:Ander_1]
